name: Bigo tank invasion
description:
Bigo Tank Invasion is an action game requiring wise strategy. In this game, you are just alone fighting for your survival. Are you excited about Bigo Tank Invasion?
Controlling your tank and think wisely to destroy all others tanks and warplanes, which are, of course, your dangerous enemies in map to get victory. Because you are only their target so you must cut them up as fast as possible or you will get fail. There are many scenes and different missions for you to fight as well.
------
How to play Bigo Tank Invasion:
Touch screen and move around to choose right angle, then release to shoot.
Don't forget holding to choose right strength for your shots.
-----
Features in Bigo Tank Invasion:
- Amazing graphic and sounds with special effects
- 2 missions: Normal and Time
- 20 levels and more
- Shop with different kind of tanks
-Able to take advantage of accessory items what appear accidentally to win easier
We hope all our players have a great time on exploring Bigo Tank Invasion, thanks a lot!
